modName: Elven Presets of Middle Earth - RaceMenu
summary: 4 Lord of the Rings/Tolkien inspired elven presets for RaceMenu, for your adventures.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][font=Times New Roman]
[i]~ Tolkien inspired presets by brella2002 ~

[size=4][/size][/i][img width=278,height=152]http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_macl7fmxnD1r6z3oio1_500.gif[/img]

[size=4][i][b]Requirements/optional features for females:[/b]
Fae's mods and mixes pack - UNF Skin Texture. (You can use whatever, but I used these in the screenshots).
Eyes of Beauty
Maevan2's Brows
True Brows
KS Hairdo's Renewal (1.4)
Neith Team Warpaints.
RAN's Headmesh (Type C)
UNPCM and TMB Body (I used them in the screenshots, but it's optional)

[/i][i][b]Requirements/optional features for males:
[/b]Pretty Face For Men
Eyes of Beauty
True Brows
KS Hairdo's Renewal (1.4)

Mods used in screenshots:
Bosmer Ceremonial Armor
Viking Armors for TMB Body
Nordic Ranger Armor
Rampage ENB
The Woods

How to install:
Data-SKSE-Plugins-CharGen - Drop the nif files here.
Data-SKSE-Plugins-CharGen-Presets - Drop the .jslot files here.
Go in game and type 'showracemenu' in the console by pressing the ` key (next to 1 on the keyboard).
Select the Nord race and load the nif files in the sculpt tab.
Load the preset files in the presets tab.
Done!

I sincerely hope you find as much joy out of these presets as I did making them. Thank you to everyone who has continued to support me and my mods this past year, it means a lot!
~ Bella
Credits and thank you to:
LogRaam

Kalilies, Stealthic Khaos and Shocky

calyps


[/i]

[/size][/font][/size][/center]
author: brella2002
